error_message: Something went wrong, try again later

requirement.introduction: As a Paras artist, you need to be verified to access full features of Paras. Verification gives extra visibility on the marketplace. Currently, non-verified artist's NFTs will not appear on the "market" feed. Whole process take 3-4 days.
requirement.steps: To get verified, you only need to do these steps :
requirement.step_3: Link to your social media on your Paras profile (Twitter and Instagram)
requirement.step_4: Link to your website (not required but will increase your chances of getting verified)
requirement.step_5: Have authentic art, you did not steal or have been list your own work on other platform.
requirement.step_6: You need to create at least 3 NFTs on Paras.
requirement.introduction_2: It’s also extremely important to remember that becoming verified artist does not grant you instant success.
requirement.introduction_3: It’s a method to introduce yourself to a bigger community of Paras.

status.description_status: Whole verification process may take 3-4 days, announced every Wednesday & Saturday. If you are not successfully verified, you can re-submit verification status in the next batch.
status.description_status_2: For further question, you can ask our team on Discord.

step_2.desc: Your profile is under review by our team

step_3.desc: The result of your verification request. Check your email for details.
